attributes.action: End benefits, free accommodation, education and health care to all immigrants.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.gov.uk/asylum-support/what-youll-get

This is grossly unacceptable particularly when our own people including ex servicemen, are going without and living on the streets.
attributes.background:
Nobody should be able to enter this country and be in receipt of money and services already paid for out of existing taxpayers' money. Those who have contributed nothing should be in receipt of nothing.
Divert the money to the elderly, infirm and genuinely needy indigenous people.
